roleset.name: charge too much tax
roleset.note: OVERTAX-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overtax' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, but tax is in 54.5. (from overtax.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: In today's computer networks, some machines often sit idle while others-1 are overtaxed [*-1].
